text: Arrā ga kō ōse rareta toki o omoiokose. `Īsa ― yo, ware wa anata o meshi, ware no moto ni agete, fushinjin-sha (no kyogi) kara kiyomerudearou. Mata ware wa, anata ni tsuishō suru mono o, shinpan no hi made, fushinjin no mono-tachi no jōi ni okudearou. Sorekara anata gata wa (mina) ware no moto ni kaeri, anata gata ga arasotte ita koto ni tsuite, ware wa saiketsu o kudasudearou
